dc.title: The official US time
dc.description: The official U.S. time. Public service cooperatively provided by the two time agencies of United States: a civilian agency, the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST), and its military counterpart, the U. S. Naval Observatory (USNO). Also historical and general interest exhibits.
